medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presented with several hours of new acute right upper quadrant pain. Imaging revealed disruption of the gallbladder wall contained within surrounding inflammatory rind, raising concerns for gallbladder ischemia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prior history of traumatic brain injury, depression, pinched cervical nerve, recurrent urinary tract infections after menopause, and exercise-induced asthma.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has hypertension, diabetes mellitus, and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease; father had coronary artery disease and alcohol-related liver disease.
